Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:
          Yeah, manually sweeping gives the user the opportunity of being a 
part of the whole EVP experience i feel. Same goes with using sound 
soap for evp's. The GE radio i use for the manual sweeps sounds like 
the old Frank's boxes in random mode, with the treble turned up it 
even sounds like it has an echo box. It has a good sound and given a 
bunch of clear answers to me as well, you can hear how fast i'm 
sweeping the dial yet i get the same voice with a full 
sentence....weird. If you scan up and down the band that fast, how 
do you get the same voice?

-Steve
